org.lwjgl.system.windows

Class RECT

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.lwjgl.system.PointerWrapper
      • org.lwjgl.system.Struct
        • org.lwjgl.system.windows.RECT
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Pointer

    public class RECT
extends Struct
    Defines the coordinates of the upper-left and lower-right corners of a rectangle.

    RECT members

    MemberTypeDescription
    leftLONGthe x-coordinate of the upper-left corner of the rectangle
    topLONGthe y-coordinate of the upper-left corner of the rectangle
    rightLONGthe x-coordinate of the lower-right corner of the rectangle
    bottomLONGthe y-coordinate of the lower-right corner of the rectangle

    • Constructor Detail

      • RECT

        public RECT(long struct)
        Creates a RECT instance at the specified memory address.

      • RECT

        public RECT(java.nio.ByteBuffer container)
        Creates a RECT instance at the current position of the specified ByteBuffer container. Changes to the buffer's content will be visible to the struct instance and vice versa.

        The created instance holds a strong reference to the container object.
